label: applicableDangerousGoods
comment: Dangerous goods applicable to the transport of this supply chain consignment.
Dangerous goods transport details applicable to this referenced supply chain consignment item.
Dangerous goods transport details applicable to this supply chain consignment item.
The transport dangerous goods details, at line level, applicable to this trade delivery.
Transport dangerous goods information applicable for this trade product.
Transport dangerous goods information applicable to these logistics regulated goods.

rangeIncludes.comment: Goods which may contain a substance which poses risks to people and/or the environment during transportation which is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
Articles of trade or commerce which are subject to, or controlled by a rule, regulation, or law at a particular point during their logistics lifecycle.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
